title: Secret Garden - Discography (1996-2016)
description:
SECRET GARDEN - DISCOGRAPHY
 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secret_Garden_(duo)
 
http://secretgarden.no/

Secret Garden is a Irish-Norwegian band specialized in new instrumental music, led by the duo consisting of Irish violinist and singer Fionnuala Sherry and Norwegian composer, arranger and pianist Rolf LÃ¸vland.

The group has sold over 3 million albums since having won the 1995 Eurovision Song Contest, representing Norway with the composition "Nocturne".

RELEASED: 1996-2016
NUMBER OF ALBUMS: 9
GENRES: New age, Neo-classical, Celtic, Nordic folk
SOURCE: CD
CODEC: LAME 3.99r
FORMAT: MPEG 1 Layer III
CHANNELS: 2
BITS PER SAMPLE: 16
SAMPLING RATE: 44.1 KHz
BIT RATE: 320 kbit/s
DURATION: 8:28:27
SIZE: 1.68 GB
